Name: Blocknator
About the game: Welcome to Blocknator, a simple, colorful and challenging game! Blocknator is a game of building blocks and accumulating points. When you complete one or more floors, the pieces are destroyed and you earn points. It’s that simple! There are five game modes and three different boards for you to choose and play. modes: Practice: The mode for you to learn or play quietly. Competitive: Time is not your friend! Put the pieces on the board before it's too late! Time Attack: Score as many points as possible in three minutes of play. Teacher: You need to think fast and have a good memory! In this mode the parts are visible for a short time. Time Attack + Master: Score the most points in three minutes. Watch out! The parts will be visible for a short time. Test each mode on different boards and find out which one you are the best at!
